text: Coed Cwm Clettwr is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion, west Wales. It is designated for mature broadleaf woodland.https://www.welshwildlife.org/nature-reserve/cwm-clettwr-trer-ddol- ceredigion/ The alternative spelling Coed Cwm Cletwr appears on a variety of maps over many years, but local usage has Clettwr ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion ==References== Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion
title: Coed Cwm Clettwr
